description: This source file defines the TransactionService class in Dart, providing methods to interact with a backend REST API for managing financial transactions, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting transactions, with authentication handled via tokens.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: Service class for handling transaction-related API operations, including CRUD functions for transactions.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for the authenticated user from the backend.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction with provided data.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction identified by its ID with the new data.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Deletes a transaction by its ID.
